name: Renamed Sysinternals Sdelete Usage
description: Detects the use of a renamed SysInternals Sdelete, which is something an administrator shouldn't do (the renaming)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.pe.original_file_name:sdelete.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\sdelete.exe OR *\\sdelete64.exe))))`
